summary: A young man with a motorcycle that has the ability to transform into a karate-fighting robot hunts down a gang of evil cyborgs to avenge the death of his father.
cast: Itsuji Itao|Asami|Akira Emoto|Yasuhisa Furuhara|Yûya Ishikawa|Cay Izumi|Takurô Kodama|Yuya Miyashita|Hiroaki Murakami|Yui Murata|Sakichi Sato|Aimi Satsukawa|Kentarô Shimazu|Naoto Takenaka|Demo Tanaka|Hiroyuki Watanabe|Mami Yamasaki
title: Denjin Zabôgâ
